meanings.sent1: She is the bustiest girl in our class.
meanings.sent2: The actress wore a dress that highlighted her bustiest feature.
meanings.sent3: The mannequin in the store window looked comically bustiest with its exaggerated curves.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence soared as she embraced her bustiest figure.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a woman with the bustiest silhouette imaginable.

meanings.sent1: She won the title of the bustiest in the beauty pageant.
meanings.sent2: The bustiest in the magazine always stood out among the models.
meanings.sent3: The bustiest at the party was the center of attention all night.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, being the bustiest can lead to many opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The bustiest in the group had a magnetic presence that captivated everyone.
